subject: English
atomic_concept: Our head moves from side to side.

nested_learning.intuition: We can turn our head left and right.
nested_learning.concept: Our head moves from side to side.
nested_learning.example: I move my head when I say no.
nested_learning.application: Move your head from left to right.

misconception_fit: We do not walk with our head.
The head is not used to clap.
socratic_prompts: Which part of your body moves side to side?

difficulty_modes.medium: Our head moves from side to side.
difficulty_modes.hard: We can move our head left and right.
difficulty_modes.master: The head is the top body part that can move side to side.
